channel.title: Pushing an Pulling on Bongio's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pushing an Pulling on Bongio's blog

item.title: Pushers and pullers - Or how I entrepreneur the wrong way
item.description: I’m an unrelenting pusher. No, not I don’t push drugs. I push my products and ideas to people instead of looking for their pain points and creating solutions to real problems.
